main event: Several civilian witnesses observed a strange bright object near Wink, Texas on August 13, 1952.
interesting points: The object was globular, bright white, and emitted an intense brilliant light., The object remained stationary for a while and then accelerated at a very high speed., No physical evidence was found during the investigation., The report indicated that the object was not an aircraft, satellite, or any other known object., The sighting took place in a clear sky with unlimited visibility.
